Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that Rahul Gandhi was arrested for drug possession in the US, when in reality he was only temporarily detained at an airport for about an hour.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Rahul Gandhi was arrested for drug possession in the US.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image of a newspaper clipping is genuine and accurately represents a real event, when in fact it was created using an online newspaper clipping generator.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Rahul Gandhi did not join politics until 2004, while the newspaper clipping in the image is dated September 30, 2001.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the detention of Rahul Gandhi at the airport may have been unrelated to drug possession, as the reason for his detention was not provided in the available reports.
